DataElement.preferredDefinition: Words which describe the the equipment used to perform cytogenomic analysis.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Derived from or associated with material from a whole chromosome sample.:Examination and interpretation; the process of identifying an issue to be understood and addressed, modelling the issue, investigating the model results, interpreting the results, and possibly making a recommendation. The concept also refers to the examination and study of a whole in terms of the parts composing it._Any object, or item of electrical or electronic equipment, which is designed to carry out a specific function or set of functions.
